item.description:
WHOOPS!! Looks like I forgot to update the details for the May Meetup. Note that this one will be SUNDAY, not on Saturday -- we met on Saturday last month, and we alternate so that everyone will have the chance to attend at least every other meeting.

Also note that we'll be at the Newton Center Starbuck's again, which turned out to be a pretty nice location for last month's meeting. It's still a bit loud, but easier to get to than Roslindale, so until something better comes along... see you there!

group.name: The Boston Science Fiction & Fantasy Writers Meetup Group

item.name: The Boston Science Fiction Writers May Meetup
